answerText: The Greek Passion[10] The author of The Greek Passion wrote this other work in which the title character seduces Bouboulina, a hotel owner whose real name is Madame Hortense. The title character accompanies the narrator to open a mine on Crete.

question: Question: A priest refuses to help a group of Turkish refugees in this novel and later excommunicates Manolios for trying to help them. For 10 points each: [10] Name this novel in which Manolios is selected to portray Jesus in a play and actually falls in love with Katerina who plays the role of Mary Magdalene.
